utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, okay, I checked. We have: Earl Grey, English Breakfast, Cinnamon Stick, Camomile, Mint Medley, Blackberry, and.. oh, wait, there's one more, um.. Lemon Soother. You're not the guy that asked for the tea, are you? Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Thank you. Oh, cool! Free sample of coffee!

utterance.speaker: Monica

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh. Right. ...Oh great.

utterance.content: What is it?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Country club newsletter. My mother sends me the engagement notices for 'inspiration.' Oh my God! Oh my God, it's Barry and Mindy!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Barry who you almost...?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Barry who I almost.

utterance.content: And Mindy, your maid of...?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Mindy, my maid of. Oh!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That's Mindy? Wow, she is pretty. Lucky. To have had a friend like you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Marcel. Bring me the rice, c'mon. Bring me the rice, c'mon. Good boy. Good boy. C'mere, gimme the rice. Thank you, good boy. Well, I see he's finally mastered the difference between 'bring me the' and 'pee in the'. 'Bring me the' and- Rach?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I'm sorry. Oh, this is so stupid! I mean, I gave Barry up, right? I should be happy for them! I am, I'm happy for them.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Really.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No. Oh, oh, I guess it would be different if I were- with somebody.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Whoah, uh, what happened to, uh, 'Forget relationships! I'm done with men!' The whole, uh, penis embargo?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I don't know. I guess it's not about no guys, it's about the right guy, y'know? I mean, with Barry, it was safe and it was easy, but there was no heat. With Paolo, that's all there was, was heat! And it was just this raw, animal, sexual...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wait-wait. I, I got it. I was there.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I mean, do you think you can ever have both? Y'know? Someone who's like, who's like your best friend, but then also can make your toes curl?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes. Yes. Yes! Yes, I really do! In fact, it's funny, very often, someone who you wouldn't think could-could curl your toes, might just be the one who...

utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.content: ...Gets interrupted. Hi!

utterance.content: I-I'm sorry it wasn't one of those movies with, like, y'know, guns and bombs and, like, buses going really fast...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, I don't need violence to enjoy a movie. Just so long as there's a little nudity.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I meant female nudity. Alright? I don't need to see Lou Grant frolicking.

utterance.content: Hugh! Hugh Grant!

utterance.content: Alright, I've gotta go. C'mon, Marcel! C'mon! We're gonna go take a bath. Yes we are, aren't we? Yes, we are.

utterance.content: They're still just friends, right?

utterance.speaker: Rachel

utterance.content: Uh, okay, yeah, we could do that, but before we head off to the murder capital of the North-East, I was, uh, kinda wanting to run something by you. Y'know how we were, uh, y'know, talking before about, uh, relationships and stuff? Well-

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: O-okay, now see, you never ever ever told us that...
